questDescription: Tensions between the human and gnome factions in the port town of Blackwater are reaching a boiling point. The Guard Captain has tasked you with delving into the root causes of this conflict, in the hope that you may uncover a way to defuse the situation before it erupts into open warfare.

objectives.description: Speak with the Human Ambassador in the Town Hall to get their perspective on the tensions.
Explore the Gnome District of Blackwater to gather intelligence on the gnome faction's grievances.
Confront and defeat the rioters causing unrest in the streets to restore order.
Return to the Guard Captain with your findings to discuss a potential resolution to the conflict.
